backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend canister with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four completed features that apply sage green backgrounds to Shop, ProductDetail, CareGuide, and Checkout pages while maintaining existing functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, hooks, contexts, and data files with implementation details (content appears truncated).
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining color schemes, borders, and sidebar styling using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the GreenLeaf React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component configuring TanStack Router with five routes (Home, Shop, ProductDetail, CareGuide, Checkout) and wrapping with ThemeProvider, CartProvider, and WishlistProvider.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-in cart drawer component from the right with item management (quantity controls, remove), empty state, subtotal display, and animated transitions (content appears truncated).
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with four-column grid layout containing brand info, shop links, support links, social media icons, and attribution to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking (content appears truncated).
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper managing Navbar, page outlet, Footer, and CartDrawer with state for cart visibility.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Loading spinner component with rotating sage-colored border animation using absolute positioning and Tailwind classes.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar component with responsive mobile menu, cart button with item count badge, and scroll-based styling transitions. Includes links to Home, Shop, and Care Guide pages.
frontend/src/components/PageTransition.t: Simple wrapper component that applies fade-in and slide-up animation to page content during route transitions.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card component displaying product image, details, rating, and price with hover effects. Includes add-to-cart button and wishlist toggle functionality.
frontend/src/components/WishlistButton.t: Heart-shaped button component that toggles products in/out of the wishlist with visual feedback and animation.
frontend/src/context/CartContext.tsx: React context providing cart state management with localStorage persistence, including add/remove/update operations and computed totals. Syncs cart across browser tabs via storage events.
frontend/src/context/WishlistContext.tsx: React context managing wishlist state with localStorage persistence, providing toggle and check functions for product IDs.
frontend/src/data/careGuides.ts: Static data array containing four care guide articles with titles, excerpts, categories, reading times, and images for plant care education.
frontend/src/data/categories.ts: Static data array defining four plant categories (Succulents, Tropical, Low-Light, Pet-Friendly) with descriptions and images.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Static product catalog containing detailed plant information including names, prices, care requirements, difficulty levels, and images for 8+ plant products.
frontend/src/data/testimonials.ts: Static array of three customer testimonials with names, quotes, and 5-star ratings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with authentication support, automatically recreating the actor when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Custom React hooks for responsive design: useMediaQuery tracks CSS media query matches, and useIsMobile detects mobile viewports (max-width: 768px).
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: React hook that calculates parallax scroll offset based on a configurable speed multiplier, using requestAnimationFrame for smooth performance.
frontend/src/hooks/useScroll.ts: React hook that tracks scroll position (scrollY), scroll direction (up/down), and whether the page has scrolled past 50px threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: React hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element becomes visible in the viewport, useful for triggering scroll-based animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom sage green and beige color palettes using OKLCH, dark mode support, glassmorphism utilities, and animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CareGuide.tsx: Displays plant care guide articles with reading progress bar, categorized content cards showing images, excerpts, and estimated reading times.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Multi-step checkout page with form validation, order summary, shipping/tax calculations, and cart integration for completing plant purchases.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page featuring video hero section, featured products, plant categories, care tips, benefits sections, testimonials, and newsletter signup with parallax effects.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page component that displays individual product information including images, pricing, care indicators, and related products, with add-to-cart and wishlist functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Shop page component with filterable product grid supporting category, price range, water level, and sunlight filters, with responsive mobile/desktop filter layouts.
frontend/src/types/product.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Product, CartItem, Category, Testimonial, and CareGuide interfaces used throughout the application.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom sage and beige color palettes, animations (float, accordion), shadows, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document showing completed sage green background features for Shop, Product Detail, Care Guide, and Checkout pages, with pending request to keep Home page unchanged.
